description: Chicken meal comes with fries, a bun and 2 garlic sauces.
Jumbo shrimp pieces come with fries, a bun and your choice of 2 sauces (cocktail/nugget/garlic sauce).
Served piping hot with a pack of butter on the side to spread on top.
Creamy, velvety vanilla ice cream ‚Äì eat it on its own or ask for it drizzled with chocolate sauce or strawberry sauce. To be enjoyed at any time or place.
A selection of mango, orange, apple and mixed fruit juice are available as an addition to your meal.
